text: today's recipe is super cute and super
delicious
it's a marbled pound cake but that's
just a pound cake their individual
pancakes so that makes them extra cute
chocolate and vanilla whisk 3 cups of
cake flour with a tablespoon of baking
powder it's 1/2 a teaspoon of fine salt
but I only have coarse here so I'm using
a teaspoon over in my mixer I have 2
sticks of unsalted butter this is 1 and
3/4 cups of sugar cream them then you
add your eggs this is 4 large eggs plus
2 yolks and you can add them one at a
time
they'll plop right out one at a time if
you've already cracked them into a
measuring cup then add a tablespoon of
pure vanilla extract add the dry
ingredients alternating with one and a
half cups of buttermilk buttermilk
should be room temp the eggs should be
room temp the butter everything makes
for the lightest fluffiest cakes and the
best incorporation see nice and smooth
now mix together 1/2 a cup of
unsweetened cocoa powder and 6
tablespoons of hot and/or boiling water
the hotter it is probably the better you
are
once it's whisked in then you can go
ahead and take your spatula and just
stir it until it's really nice and
smooth now add half of your cake batter
to the chocolate mixture it's going to
be swirled so don't worry up a little
bit of chocolate is in your white cake
batter so now you have two flavors of
cake batter vanilla and chocolate I've
four mini loaf pans about 6 by 2 inches
and they've been buttered you doll up
your batter about a spoonful of vanilla
on one side and then on the other side
chocolate now alternate layers so
actually I can just put a dollop of
chocolate on top of my vanilla on the
other side go around again and
back to the vanilla now you take a
skewer and you just swirl everything
together swirly or unswerving
have your oven preheating to 350 degrees
get these into the oven and bake them
until the top Springs back when lightly
touched that'll take about 40 to 45
minutes so cute so cute but not just
cute I'm sure they're delicious shall I
show you how delicious they are by
eating a piece why not ah look marbled
on the inside nice and moist mmm
perfect worked great so impressive
save some for yourself put them in the
freezer give them away do whatever you
want with them but make this recipe as
soon as you can
you
